numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that the number of colored players in MLP is lower than the number of colored players in the other associations.
2. I wonder why the number of colored head coaches in the NFL is so low compared to the other associations.
3. This situation affects me and my community.
4. This situation does not diversify the team as a whole.
5. If the team is not diverse, then some players may not be encouraged to try out for the sport.
6. The graph shows the diversity of each sport association.
7. The graph shows the diversity of players in each sport association.
8. The graph shows the diversity of head coaches in each sport association.
9. The headline is: Lack of diversity among coaches compared to players.
